name: HarbourLightSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Dining Bulb.”
”Alexa, set Dining Bulb brightness to 80.”
”Alexa, set Dining Bulb to yellow.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Harbour Light Smart Home, you can turn on and off with Harbour Light Bulbs by Alexa now.

e.g.
"Alexa, turn on / off Dining Bulb."
"Alexa, set Dining Bulb brightness to 0-100."
"Alexa, set Dining Bulb to 0-100 percent."
"Alexa, brighten Dining Bulb."
"Alexa, dim Dining Bulb."
"Alexa, set Dining Bulb to red / orange / yellow / green / blue / purple."
"Alexa, set Dining Bulb to warm white / soft white / white / daylight white / cool white."

Enjoy~
